title: Always Laughing Cafe
description: Serves meat, veg options available. While no meat is offered, some of the food contain animal products such as pork extract, oils of animal origin or collagen in the cookies -- so please be aware and do ask what's veg. Cafe is located in Always Laughing yoga studio near Nakano Sakaue station. Lunch plate costs around 1000yen. Has small vegan sweets.
